attributes.action: Allow the peaceful undertaking of an Iranian Civil Nuclear Power scheme and to discourage at all turns any countries who wish to disallow Iran's civil nuclear scheme via force
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Iran has a simple right to power it's nation, a right which is under threat from excessive western pressure. To force Iran to give up it's right to power its nation is to impoverish the Iranian people and to set Middle Eastern diplomacy back decades. Signing this petition will show your wish to ensure Iran is allowed to peacefully continue its civil power scheme,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
